about_the_game:
Climbing upwards in the geological area! Go to a higher affluent area to explore!
First Person Shooting Exploring
Climbing upwards in the geological area! Go to a higher affluent area to explore! First person shooter exploration games, as well as more multiplayer modes (currently under development). Play alone or entertain with friends. Including but not limited to: pigeons, adventure, shooting, horror, multi firearms, first person, collaboration, level crossing, random elements, and so on. In this game, as an employee, you discover an abnormal phenomenon in your area. You wake up in the workplace, prepare your equipment, and plan to explore

name: INSANE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: i3-4570
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10240 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
